<title level="1" right="Trait">[Backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=544)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 282 <sup>2.0</sup>

When you hit an [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creature, this weapon deals 1 precision damage in addition to its normal damage. The precision damage increases to 2 if the weapon is a _+3 weapon_.
name: Backstabber
